data.system_settings: Samsung galaxy core plus sm g350, 4.2.2
data.actual_result: There is no sheet bar to indicate you selected it
data.expected_result: When you long press there should be a grey sheet bar indicating you selected that cat/channel
data.short_description: Sorting categories/channels has no grey sheet
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings>channels(have perms)  - Filter to sort by category/text channel - Long press on one of them and move it, notice how there's no sheet bar
